Segment.name: BIX
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying numbers, dates, and other basic data relating to the transaction set

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: InspectionLocationTypeCode
Field.comment: Code to define the location where a type of inspection is performed

Field.name: RampIdentification
Field.comment: A mutually agreed upon ramp identity

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: InspectorIdentityCode
Field.comment: A code assigned by each inspection agency to each inspector

Field.name: DamageCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the party maintaining damage area, damage type and damage severity code lists

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code
